Second Session

DISCUSSIONS: TTH 1 - 2 JGB 2.102
TTH 2 - 3 JGB 2.102
*Class begins at 10am and ends at 11:15am. You are expected to be in class for the complete time.
*You are expected to take each exam on the designated date. If you miss an exam and have no medical
documentation of a problem, you will receive a zero.
*The course is over with the final exam. There is NO WAY to earn extra credit (anytime) or to change your grade.
NO ELECTRONIC DEVICES ARE ALLOWED EXCEPT RECORDERS.
YOU CANNOT TAKE EXAMS AT ANOTHER TIME; PLEASE DO NOT ASK.

7-12 The chromosome complement 14

7-15 Population genetics 23

7-19 Inbreeding and migration 23
7-20 Selection 23

7-22 The organization of genetic variation 23

7-26 Adaptive radiation 25
7-27 Human evolution 34
